tool_description: API showing all the latest LGBTQ+ News around the World
name: LGBTQ World News Live
title: LGBTQ World News Live

api_list.name: Get Individual News from Source
api_list.description: Get News about LGBTQ+ from a specific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lgbtq-world-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/gaytimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lgbtq-world-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://lgbtq-world-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lgbtq-world-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All LGBTQ+ News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about LGBTQ+ from all over the world.
